text: Ovarian cysts are collections of fluids, surrounded by a very thin wall within an ovary. Ovarian follicles that are larger than two centimeters are termed ovarian cysts. The cysts range from pea-sized to just larger than an orange. Most cysts are functional in nature and harmless. Ovarian cysts affect women of any age. Category:Diseases and disorders of the female reproductive system
title: Ovarian cyst
